name: Krengs
description:
Krengs:

Krengs is a chaotic survival game where you play as a kreng attempting to escape multiple disaster like a flooding bridge, a crashing crane and even a sinking boat!

(CURRENT BUILD IS TEST)

Devon Jenkin-Hunt (Project Leadd)

June Reay (Level Design)
